name: magnolia-stain
description: landing page for magnolia stain and seal

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && gallery.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/gallery.html && services.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/services.html

author: Charles Rayner
